examples.example: 我怀着喜悦的心情来到了这个美丽的地方。

translate.english: I came to this beautiful place with a joyful mood.

examples.example: 他经过不懈努力来到了自己梦寐以求的学府。

translate.english: He came to the institution he had been dreaming of through unremitting efforts.

examples.example: 我开心地来到了那片充满希望的田野。

translate.english: I happily came to that field full of hope.
